column4: hey, guys, im installing a debian on an 32mb ram, 486 (or somthing like that) pentium. and HD size is 171mb, so i need a root and a swap partitions. the question is - "what would u advise as a swap partition size?" :)
nono, this is the reason i got that low hardware, to tinker with it, have other better system aroun he :)
